00340     function AddHost($host)
00341     {
00342         $this->DelHost($host);
00343         return $this->AppendToFile($this->confDir.'hosts', $host);
00344     }
00345 
00350     function DelHost($host)
00351     {
00352         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->confDir.'hosts', "/^(\h*$host(\s|))/m", '');
00353     }
00354 
00359     function GetHosts()
00360     {
00361         global $Re_Ip;
00362 
00363         return $this->SearchFileAll($this->confDir.'hosts', "/^\h*(($Re_Ip|[:\d]+)\b.*)\h*$/m");
00364     }
00365 
00370     function GetStaticGateway()
00371     {
00372         return $this->GetFile($this->confDir.'mygate');
00373     }
00374 
00379     function GetMyName()
00380     {
00381         return $this->GetFile($this->confDir.'myname');
00382     }
00383 
00388     function GetNameServer()
00389     {
00390         return $this->SearchFile($this->confDir.'resolv.conf', "/^\h*nameserver\h*([^#]*)\h*$/m");
00391     }
00392 
00397     function GetRootEmail()
00398     {
00399         return $this->SearchFile($this->confDir.'mail/aliases', "/^\h*root:\h*([^#]*)\h*$/m");
00400     }
00401 
00402     function GetIfConfig($if)
00403     {
00404         $file= $this->confDir."hostname.".$if;
00405         if (file_exists($file)) {
00406             if (($contents= $this->GetFile($file)) !== FALSE) {
00407                 $re= '^\s*(inet|dhcp)\s*(\S*)\s*(\S*)\s*(\S*)\s*(\S*)\s*$';
00408                 if (preg_match("/$re/m", $contents, $match)) {
00409                     return serialize(array_slice($match, 1));
00410                 }
00411             }
00412         }
00413         return FALSE;
00414     }
00415 
00418     function GetDynamicGateway()
00419     {
00420         global $Re_Ip;
00421 
00422         $cmd= "/sbin/route -n get default | /usr/bin/grep gateway 2>&1";
00423         exec($cmd, $output, $retval);
00424         if ($retval === 0) {
00425             if (count($output) > 0) {
00426                 #    gateway: 10.0.0.2
00427                 $re= "\s*gateway:\s*($Re_Ip)\s*";
00428                 if (preg_match("/$re/m", $output[0], $match)) {
00429                     return $match[1];
00430                 }
00431             }
00432         }
00433         else {
00434             $errout= implode("\n", $output);
00435             ViewError($errout);
00436             cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Get dynamic gateway failed: $errout");
00437         }
00438         return FALSE;
00439     }
00440 
00441     function GetConfig()
00442     {
00443         global $MODEL_PATH, $ModelFiles, $Models;
00444         
00445         $config= array();
00446         
00447         if (($myname= $this->GetMyName()) !== FALSE) {
00448             $config['Myname']= trim($myname);
00449         }
00450     
00451         if (($mygate= $this->GetStaticGateway()) !== FALSE) {
00452             $config['Mygate']= trim($mygate);
00453             $config['StaticGateway']= TRUE;
00454         }
00455         else if (($mygate= $this->GetDynamicGateway()) !== FALSE) {
00456             $config['Mygate']= trim($mygate);
00457             $config['StaticGateway']= FALSE;
00458         }
00459 
00460         if (($intif= $this->GetIntIf()) !== FALSE) {
00461             $config['IntIf']= trim($intif, '"');
00462         }
00463         
00464         if (($extif= $this->GetExtIf()) !== FALSE) {
00465             $config['ExtIf']= trim($extif, '"');
00466         }
00467         
00468         if (($ifs= $this->GetPhyIfs()) !== FALSE) {
00469             $ifs= explode("\n", $ifs);
00470             foreach ($ifs as $if) {
00471                 $config['Ifs'][$if]= array();
00472                 if (($output= $this->GetIfConfig($if)) !== FALSE) {
00473                     $config['Ifs'][$if]= unserialize($output);
00474                 }
00475             }
00476         }
00477         
00478         return serialize($config);
00479     }
00480 
00481     function SystemMakeStaticGateway()
00482     {
00483         if (($gateway= $this->GetDynamicGateway()) !== FALSE) {
00484             return $this->SetMyGate($gateway);
00485         }
00486         return FALSE;
00487     }
00488 
00489     function SystemMakeDynamicGateway()
00490     {
00491         return $this->DeleteFile($this->confDir.'mygate');
00492     }
00493 
00498     function SetMyGate($mygate)
00499     {
00500         // If filename does not exist, the file is created. Otherwise, the existing file is overwritten
00501         return file_put_contents($this->confDir.'mygate', $mygate.PHP_EOL);
00502     }
00503 
00508     function SetMyName($myname)
00509     {
00510         return file_put_contents($this->confDir.'myname', $myname.PHP_EOL);
00511     }
00512 
00522     function SetIf($if, $type, $ip, $mask, $bc, $opt)
00523     {
00524         global $Re_Ip;
00525         
00526         // Trim for whitespace caused by empty strings
00527         $ifconf= trim("$type $ip $mask $bc $opt");
00528         // ComixWall supports only these configuration
00529         if (preg_match("/^inet\s*$Re_Ip\s*$Re_Ip\s*($Re_Ip|).*$/", $ifconf)
00530             || preg_match('/^dhcp\s*NONE\s*NONE\s*NONE.*$/', $ifconf)
00531             || preg_match('/^dhcp$/', $ifconf)) {
00533             return file_put_contents($this->confDir.'hostname.'.$if, $ifconf.PHP_EOL);
00534         }
00535         else {
00536             ViewError(_('Unsupported interface configuration').": $ifconf");
00537         }
00538         return FALSE;
00539     }
00540 
00545     function DeleteIf($if)
00546     {
00547         exec("/sbin/ifconfig $if down");
00548         exec("/sbin/ifconfig $if delete");
00549         return $this->DeleteFile($this->confDir.'hostname.'.$if);
00550     }
00551 
00556     function SetNameServer($nameserver)
00557     {
00558         global $Re_Ip;
00559         
00560         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->confDir.'resolv.conf', "/^(\h*nameserver\h*)($Re_Ip)(\b.*)$/m", '${1}'.$nameserver.'${3}');
00561     }
00562 
00567     function SetRootEmail($emailaddr)
00568     {
00569         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->confDir.'mail/aliases', "/^(\h*root:\h*)([^#\s]*)(.*)$/m", '${1}'.$emailaddr.'${3}');
00570     }
00571 
00574     function SetManCgiHome($ip)
00575     {
00576         $re= '|^(\s*\$www\{\'home\'\}\h*=\h*\')(.*)(\'\h*;\h*)$|m';
00577         return $this->ReplaceRegexp('/var/www/cgi-bin/man.cgi', $re, '${1}'."https://$ip".'${3}');
00578     }
00579 
00584     function SetDateTime($datetime)
00585     {
00586         exec("/bin/date $datetime 2>&1", $output, $retval);
00588         if ($retval === 2) {
00589             return TRUE;
00590         }
00591         $errout= implode("\n", $output);
00592         ViewError($errout);
00593         cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Set date failed: $errout");
00594         return FALSE;
00595     }
00596 
00599     function UpdateMailAliases()
00600     {
00601         return $this->RunShellCommand('/usr/bin/newaliases');
00602     }
00603 
00606     function AutoConfig()
00607     {
00608         global $ROOT;
00609         
00610         exec("$ROOT/Installer/install.php -a 2>&1", $output, $retval);
00611         if ($retval === 0) {
00612             return TRUE;
00613         }
00614         $errout= implode("\n", $output);
00615         ViewError($errout);
00616         cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Auto configuration failed: $errout");
00617         return FALSE;
00618     }

00622     function InitGraphs()
00623     {
00624         global $VIEW_PATH;
00625 
00626         $success= TRUE;
00627         // symon
00628         exec("/bin/rm -f ${VIEW_PATH}symon/cache/* 2>&1", $output, $retval);
00629         // Failing to clear the cache dir is not fatal
00630         exec("/bin/rm -f ${VIEW_PATH}symon/rrds/localhost/*.rrd 2>&1", $output, $retval);
00631         if ($retval === 0) {
00632             exec('/bin/sh /usr/local/share/symon/c_smrrds.sh all 2>&1', $output, $retval);
00633             if ($retval !== 0) {
00634                 $success= FALSE;
00635             }
00636         }
00637         else {
00638             $success= FALSE;
00639         }
00640         
00641         // pnrg
00642         exec("/bin/rm -f ${VIEW_PATH}pmacct/protograph/comixwall.rrd 2>&1", $output, $retval);
00643         if ($retval === 0) {
00644             exec("/bin/sh ${VIEW_PATH}pmacct/protograph/createrrd.sh 2>&1", $output, $retval);
00645             if ($retval !== 0) {
00646                 $success= FALSE;
00647             }
00648         }
00649         else {
00650             $success= FALSE;
00651         }
00652         
00653         // protograph
00654         exec("/bin/rm -f ${VIEW_PATH}pmacct/pnrg/spool/*.{gif,cgi,rrd,desc} 2>&1", $output, $retval);
00655         if ($retval !== 0) {
00656             $success= FALSE;
00657         }
00658                 
00659         if (!$success) {
00660             $errout= implode("\n", $output);
00661             ViewError($errout);
00662             cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Failed initializing graphs: $errout");
00663         }
00664         return $success;
00665     }
00666 
00669     function DeleteStats()
00670     {
00671         exec('/bin/rm -rf /var/tmp/comixwall/* 2>&1', $output, $retval);
00672         if ($retval === 0) {
00673             return TRUE;
00674         }
00675         $errout= implode("\n", $output);
00676         ViewError($errout);
00677         cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Failed erasing statistics files: $errout");
00678         return FALSE;
00679     }
00680     
00683     function Shutdown()
00684     {
00685         global $TmpFile;
00686         
00687         $this->RunShellCommand("/sbin/shutdown -h -p now > $TmpFile 2>&1 &");
00688     }
00689 
00690     function Restart()
00691     {
00692         global $TmpFile;
00693         
00694         $this->RunShellCommand("/sbin/shutdown -r now > $TmpFile 2>&1 &");
00695     }

00717     function DisplayRemoteTime($timeserver)
00718     {
00719         global $TmpFile;
00720         
00721         $this->Pkill('rdate');
00722         return $this->RunShellCommand("/usr/sbin/rdate -p $timeserver > $TmpFile 2>&1 &");
00723     }
00724 
00727     function SetRemoteTime($timeserver)
00728     {
00729         global $TmpFile;
00730 
00731         $this->Pkill('rdate');
00732         return $this->RunShellCommand("/usr/sbin/rdate $timeserver > $TmpFile 2>&1 &");
00733     }
00734 
00735     function GetRemoteTime()
00736     {
00737         global $TmpFile;
00738         
00739         $count= 0;
00740         while ($count++ < self::PROC_STAT_TIMEOUT) {
00741             if (!$this->IsRunning('rdate')) {
00742                 break;
00743             }
00744             // shell sleep command seems not affected by changes to clock
00745             exec('/bin/sleep .1');
00746         }
00747         
00748         if ($count < self::PROC_STAT_TIMEOUT) {
00749             if (($output= $this->GetFile($TmpFile)) !== FALSE) {
00750                 $retval= $output;
00751             }
00752         }
00753         else {
00754             $retval= _('The process is taking too long, thus will run in the background.');
00755         }
00756         return $retval;
00757     }
00758     
00761     function GetServiceStartStatus()
00762     {
00763         $output= array();
00764         foreach ($this->rcConfLocalServices as $service) {
00765             $stat= $this->GetServiceStatRcConfLocal($this->rcConfLocal, $service);
00766             if ($stat === '') {
00767                 $output[$service]= TRUE;
00768             }
00769             else if ($stat === '#') {
00770                 $output[$service]= FALSE;
00771             }
00772         }
00773         foreach ($this->rcLocalServices as $service) {
00774             $stat= $this->GetServiceStatRcLocal($this->confDir.'rc.local', $service);
00775             if ($stat === '') {
00776                 $output[$service]= TRUE;
00777             }
00778             else if ($stat === '#') {
00779                 $output[$service]= FALSE;
00780             }
00781         }
00782         return serialize($output);
00783     }
00784     
00791     function GetServiceStatRcConfLocal($file, $service)
00792     {
00793         return $this->SearchFile($file, "/^\h*(#|)\h*$service\h*=.*$/m");
00794     }
00795 
00802     function GetServiceStatRcLocal($file, $service)
00803     {
00804         $service= Escape($service, '/');
00805         return $this->SearchFile($file, "/^\h*(#|)\h*$service\b.*$/m");
00806     }

00812     function DisableService($service)
00813     {
00814         if (in_array($service, $this->rcConfLocalServices)) {
00815             return $this->DisableServiceRcConfLocal($service);
00816         }
00817         else if (in_array($service, $this->rcLocalServices)) {
00818             return $this->DisableServiceRcLocal($service);
00819         }
00820         else {
00821             return FALSE;
00822         }
00823     }
00824 
00829     function EnableService($service)
00830     {
00831         if (in_array($service, $this->rcConfLocalServices)) {
00832             return $this->EnableServiceRcConfLocal($service);
00833         }
00834         else if (in_array($service, $this->rcLocalServices)) {
00835             return $this->EnableServiceRcLocal($service);
00836         }
00837         else {
00838             return FALSE;
00839         }
00840     }

00847     {

00849     }

00882     function GetLogsConfig()
00883     {
00884         global $MODEL_PATH, $ModelFiles, $Models, $ModelsToLogConfig;
00885 
00886         $output= array();
00887         foreach ($ModelsToLogConfig as $m) {
00888             if (array_key_exists($m, $ModelFiles)) {
00889                 require_once($MODEL_PATH.$ModelFiles[$m]);
00890 
00891                 if (class_exists($Models[$m])) {
00892                     $model= new $Models[$m]();
00893                     if (($config= $model->GetNewsyslogConfig($m)) !== FALSE) {
00894                         $output= array_merge($output, $config);
00895                     }
00896                 }
00897                 else {
00898                     cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Not in Models: $m");
00899                 }
00900             }
00901             else {
00902                 cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Not in ModelFiles: $m");
00903             }
00904         }
00905         return serialize($output);
00906     }
00907 
00910     function SetLogsConfig($model, $file, $count, $size, $when)
00911     {
00912         global $MODEL_PATH, $ModelFiles, $Models, $ModelsToLogConfig;
00913 
00914         if (array_key_exists($model, $ModelFiles)) {
00915             require_once($MODEL_PATH.$ModelFiles[$model]);
00916 
00917             if (class_exists($Models[$model])) {
00918                 $model= new $Models[$model]();
00919                 return $model->SetNewsyslogConfig($file, $count, $size, $when);
00920             }
00921             else {
00922                 cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Not in Models: $model");
00923             }
00924         }
00925         else {
00926             cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Not in ModelFiles: $model");
00927         }
00928         return FALSE;
00929     }
00930 
00933     function RotateLogFile($file)
00934     {
00935         return $this->DaemonizeFunc('DaemonizedRotateLogFile', $file);
00936     }
00937 
00942     function DaemonizedRotateLogFile($file)
00943     {
00944         global $TmpFile;
00945 
00946         if (($contents= $this->GetFile($this->newSyslogConf)) !== FALSE) {
00947             $re_filepath= Escape($file, '/');
00948             $re_owner= '([\w:]+|)';
00949             $re_mode= '(\d+)';
00950             $re_count= '(\d+)';
00951             $re_size= '(\d+|\*)';
00952             $re_when= '(\d+|\*)';
00953 
00954             $re= "/^(\s*$re_filepath\s+$re_owner\s*$re_mode\s+$re_count\s+$re_size\s+$re_when\s+.*)$/m";
00955             if (preg_match($re, $contents, $match)) {
00956                 $line= $match[1];
00957                 $cmd= "/bin/echo '$line' | /usr/bin/newsyslog -vF -f -  > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00958                 exec($cmd, $output, $retval);
00959                 if ($retval === 0) {
00960                     return TRUE;
00961                 }
00962                 $errout= implode("\n", $output);
00963                 ViewError($errout);
00964                 cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Log rotation failed: $errout");
00965             }
00966         }
00967         return FALSE;
00968     }
00969 
00972     function RotateAllLogFiles()
00973     {
00974         return $this->DaemonizeFunc('DaemonizedRotateAllLogFiles');
00975     }
00976 
00982     function DaemonizedRotateAllLogFiles()
00983     {
00984         global $TmpFile;
00985 
00986         $cmd= "/usr/bin/newsyslog -vF -f $this->newSyslogConf > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00987         exec($cmd, $output, $retval);
00988         if ($retval === 0) {
00989             return TRUE;
00990         }
00991         $errout= implode("\n", $output);
00992         ViewError($errout);
00993         cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Log rotation failed: $errout");
00994         return FALSE;
00995     }
00996     
00999     function DaemonizeFunc($func, $param= '')
01000     {
01001         $pid= pcntl_fork();
01002         if ($pid == -1) {
01003             cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Cannot fork');
01004         }
01005         else if ($pid) {
01006              // Parent should exit
01007             return TRUE;
01008         }
01009         else {
01010             // Make the child process a session leader
01011             $sid= posix_setsid();
01012             if ($sid < 0) {
01013                 cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Cannot make the child a session leader');
01014                 // Exit if cannot daemonize completely
01015                 return FALSE;
01016             }
01017             // The child is daemonized now, hence survives even if its process group is killed.
01018             // This is necessary when rotating httpd logs.
01019 
01020             $argv= array();
01021             if ($param !== '') {
01022                 $argv= array($param);
01023             }
01024             return call_user_func_array(array($this, $func), $argv);
01025         }
01026     }
01027 
01030     function SetPassword($user, $passwd)
01031     {
01033         exec("/usr/bin/htpasswd -b -s $this->passwdFile $user $passwd 2>&1", $output, $retval);
01034         if ($retval === 0) {
01035             return TRUE;
01036         }
01037         $errout= implode("\n", $output);
01038         ViewError($errout);
01039         cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Set password failed: $errout");
01040         return FALSE;
01041     }

01049         return $this->SetNVP($ROOT.'/lib/setup.php', '\$DefaultLocale', "'$locale';");

01080     {

01084             $timeout= 10;
01085         }
01086         
01087         $this->NVPS= '=';

01089         return $this->SetNVP($VIEW_PATH.'lib/setup.php', '\$SessionTimeout', $timeout.';');

01092     function NetStart()
01093     {
01094         // Should refresh pf rules too
01095         $cmd= "/bin/sh /etc/netstart 2>&1 && /sbin/pfctl -f $this->PfRulesFile 2>&1";
01096         exec($cmd, $output, $retval);
01097         if ($retval === 0) {
01098             return TRUE;
01099         }
01100         $errout= implode("\n", $output);
01101         ViewError($errout);
01102         cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Netstart failed: $errout");
01103         return FALSE;
01104     }
01105     
01113     function SelectProcesses($psout)
01114     {
01115         //   PID STARTED  %CPU      TIME %MEM   RSS   VSZ STAT  PRI  NI TTY      USER     GROUP    COMMAND
01116         //     1  5:10PM   0.0   0:00.03  0.0   388   412 Is     10   0 ??       root     wheel    /sbin/init
01117         $re= '/^\s*(\d+)\s+(\S+)\s+(\S+)\s+(\S+)\s+(\S+)\s+(\d+)\s+(\d+)\s+(\S+)\s+(\d+)\s+(\d+)\s+\S+\s+(\S+)\s+(\S+)\s+(.+)$/';
01118         
01119         $processes= array();
01120         foreach ($psout as $line) {
01121             if (preg_match($re, $line, $match)) {
01122                 $processes[]= array(
01123                     $match[1],
01124                     $match[2],
01125                     $match[3],
01126                     $match[4],
01127                     $match[5],
01128                     $match[6],
01129                     $match[7],
01130                     $match[8],
01131                     $match[9],
01132                     $match[10],
01133                     $match[11],
01134                     $match[12],
01135                     $match[13],
01136                     );
01137             }
01138         }
01139         return $processes;
01140     }
